TerrainDef.label: Tatami (New)
TerrainDef.description: Tatami is unique to Japan. The room with this flooring material is called Japanese style room. This flooring material is superior in all aspects such as air purification action, insulation, moisture wicking, soundproofing, antibacterial. Unlike carpets, weeds contain moisture and therefore have some fire protection. The smell of tatami will make you relax.
